name: Moonrise (itch) (Beck Phillips)
description:
Ever since she left, it's been nighttime. Maybe the Gods can help find her?

Moonrise is a short RPG about the Sun, Moon, Stars, and a young woman searching for her sister.

Music created by Finn Talisker. TOGOPOMG Logo created by PepBrew64This game was created in ~1 week for the 2022 Narrative Driven Game Jam.
